label: 掃部寮
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Bureau (ryō) under the Ministry of the Imperial Household (Kunaishō ). Formerly called the Housekeeping Office (Kanimori-no-tsukasa) under the Ministry of the Treasury (Ōkurashō) and the Inner Housekeeping Office (Uchi-no-kanimori-no-tsukasa) under the Ministry of the Imperial Household. These were combined to make this bureau. In charge of mats, blinds, cushions, screens and so forth. [宮内省、大蔵省、掃部寮、内掃部寮]
